argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | iprodcl.1 | |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) |
| 2 |  | iprodcl.2 | |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 3 |  | iprodcl.3 | |- ( ph -> E. n e. Z E. y ( y =/= 0 /\ seq n ( x. , F ) ~~> y ) ) |
| 4 |  | iprodcl.4 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = A ) |
| 5 |  | iprodcl.5 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_iprod | |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. Z A = ( ~~> ` seq M ( x. , F ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_fclim | |- ~~> : dom ~~> --> CC |
| 8 | 4, 5 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. CC ) |
| 9 | 1, 3, 8 | #P_ntrivcvg | |- ( ph -> seq M ( x. , F ) e. dom ~~> ) |
| 10 |  | #P_ffvelrn | |- ( ( ~~> : dom ~~> --> CC /\ seq M ( x. , F ) e. dom ~~> ) -> ( ~~> ` seq M ( x. , F ) ) e. CC ) |
| 11 | 7, 9, 10 | #P_sylancr | |- ( ph -> ( ~~> ` seq M ( x. , F ) ) e. CC ) |
| 12 | 6, 11 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. Z A e. CC ) |
